mapper.sql: TEMPLATE_ID, TEMPLATE_NAME, USER_ID, TEMPLATE_STATUS, TEMPLATE_DES, TEMPLATE_CREATETIME
mapper.select: select top ${limit} *,oaUser.USER_NAME from OA_CONTRACT_TEMPLATE template,OA_USER oaUser where TEMPLATE_ID not in(select top ${offset} TEMPLATE_ID from OA_CONTRACT_TEMPLATE where 1=1 ORDER BY TEMPLATE_CREATETIME DESC ) and oaUser.USER_ID = template.USER_ID ORDER BY TEMPLATE_CREATETIME DESC
mapper.insert: insert into OA_CONTRACT_TEMPLATE (TEMPLATE_ID, TEMPLATE_NAME, USER_ID, TEMPLATE_STATUS, TEMPLATE_DES, TEMPLATE_CREATETIME, TEMPLATE_HTML) values (#{templateId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{templateName,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{templateStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{templateDes,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{templateCreatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{templateHtml,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})

insert into OA_CONTRACT_TEMPLATE
TEMPLATE_ID,
TEMPLATE_NAME,
USER_ID,
TEMPLATE_STATUS,
TEMPLATE_DES,
TEMPLATE_CREATETIME,
TEMPLATE_HTML,
#{templateId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{templateName,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
#{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{templateStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{templateDes,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
#{templateCreatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{templateHtml,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update OA_CONTRACT_TEMPLATE
TEMPLATE_NAME = #{templateName,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
TEMPLATE_STATUS = #{templateStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
TEMPLATE_DES = #{templateDes,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
TEMPLATE_CREATETIME = #{templateCreatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
TEMPLATE_HTML = #{templateHtml,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where TEMPLATE_ID = #{templateId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update OA_CONTRACT_TEMPLATE set TEMPLATE_NAME = #{templateName,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, TEMPLATE_STATUS = #{templateStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, TEMPLATE_DES = #{templateDes,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, TEMPLATE_CREATETIME = #{templateCreatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, TEMPLATE_HTML = #{templateHtml,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where TEMPLATE_ID = #{templateId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update OA_CONTRACT_TEMPLATE set TEMPLATE_NAME = #{templateName,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, TEMPLATE_STATUS = #{templateStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, TEMPLATE_DES = #{templateDes,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, TEMPLATE_CREATETIME = #{templateCreatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where TEMPLATE_ID = #{templateId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
